outline:
1. to touch, reach, strike
    1. (Qal)
      1. to touch
      2. to strike
      3. to reach, extend to
      4. to be stricken
        1. stricken (participle)
      5. (Niphal) to be stricken, be defeated
      6. (Piel) to strike
      7. (Pual) to be stricken (by disease)
      8. (Hiphil) to cause to touch, reach, approach, arrive
        1. to cause to touch, apply
        2. to reach, extend, attain, arrive, come
        3. to approach (of time)
        4. to befall (of fate)
kjv_def: beat, ([idiom] be able to) bring (down), cast, come (nigh), draw near (nigh), get up, happen, join, near, plague, reach (up), smite, strike, touch.
strongs_def: properly, to touch, i.e. lay the hand upon (for any purpose; euphemistically, to lie with a woman); by implication, to reach (figuratively, to arrive, acquire); violently, to strike (punish, defeat, destroy, etc.)
